t1.name: ironfang
t1.description: This trinket will make even the most docile dog appear ferocious. the basic bite -e322- of animals becomes piercing.

t2.name: ring of Cold Resistance
t2.description: A crucial piece of equipment for anyone insane enough to explore the highest peaks of this world.

t3.name: ring of Fire Resistance
t3.description: A crucial piece of equipment for anyone insane enough to explore the scorching deserts of this world.

t4.name: ring of Poison Resistance
t4.description: A crucial piece of equipment for anyone insane enough to explore the noxious swamps of this world.

t5.name: ring of Shock Resistance
t5.description: A crucial piece of equipment for anyone insane enough to explore the lightning storms of this world.

t6.name: crystalized warrior's blood
t6.description: You've been told that this gem is the crystalized blood of a great warrior of times past. as you hold it in your hand the thought itself seems to fill you with strength: +1 str and +1 attack.

t7.name: Barkskin amulet
t7.description: This magical amulet turns your flesh rough and barklike... which makes you a great target practice for those Fireballs (natural prot is set to 10 or +1 if already >= that, -5 fire Resistance)

t8.name: champion's skull
t8.description: Apparently this is the skull of a legendary general. it is said that carrying it through training helps to gain insight and skill faster: +5% on each minute tick for task completion.

t9.name: pendant of fate
t9.description: This pendant will magically prevent some catastrophes from striking the wearer. not that its effectiveness could ever be verified.

t10.name: vigorous belt
t10.description: This belt is highly sought after by those who wear heavier armor. It will constantly reinvigorate the wearer, decreasing their fatigue.
